snippet.title: Might & Magic Heroes: Era of Chaos - Official Launch Trailer | Ubisoft Mobile
snippet.description:
#MMHEOC #MightandMagic #EraofChaos

The Classic saga returns as an epic Army Battle Strategic RPG!

Download the game now
Google Play: http://bit.ly/2D5HkbY
Apple Store: http://bit.ly/35nnPrC

Join Queen Catherine Ironfist on a quest to restore the Kingdom of Erathia ravaged by war. Summon legendary heroes, assemble massive armies of mythical creatures, mighty knights and powerful spellcasters, and use strategy and magic to prevail in battle.

Rise to the challenge and unleash chaos! 
But keep in mind… strategy is key.
